loan_apps_in_kenya.description: Sotiwa is a mobile lending app in Kenya that provides short-term loans to users for various financial needs.
Pezesha is a peer-to-peer micro-lending platform in Kenya that connects borrowers with individual lenders.
Soko Loan is a digital lending platform that offers loans to Kenyan users with competitive interest rates.
StashFin is a digital lending app that provides loans to Kenyan borrowers with flexible repayment terms.
FlashPesa is a mobile lending app in Kenya that offers instant loans to users for emergencies.
KopaKash is a mobile loan app that provides quick loans to Kenyan borrowers.
Jazika is a mobile lending app in Kenya that offers personal loans with a simple application process.
Afri Kash is a digital lending platform that provides quick loans to Kenyan users.
EazzyLoan is a mobile loan app offered by Equity Bank that provides loans to Kenyan customers.
Iloan is a digital lending app in Kenya that offers loans to users with flexible terms and conditions.
Neyborly Loans is a peer-to-peer lending platform that connects borrowers and lenders in Kenya.
Zawadi Loans is a mobile lending app that offers quick loans to Kenyan users with no collateral required.
Saida Chap is a mobile lending app that provides instant loans to Kenyan users for various financial needs.
Utunzi Loan is a digital lending platform in Kenya that offers loans with competitive interest rates.
Senti Wazi is a digital lending app that provides quick loans to Kenyan borrowers with a straightforward application process.
CashNow is a mobile lending app in Kenya that offers fast and convenient loans to users.
Saida Plus is an upgraded version of Saida, offering larger loan amounts to Kenyan users.
Jijenge Credit is a microfinance institution in Kenya that provides loans to individuals and businesses.
Stawika Loan is a mobile lending app that offers loans to Kenyan users based on their financial behavior and mobile data.
PesaPata Plus is an upgraded version of PesaPata, offering larger loan amounts to Kenyan users.
